issues.question: who is the prime minister of india
issues.answer: The current Prime Minister of India is Narendra Modi.

issues.question: what is the pm kisan scheme
issues.answer: PM-KISAN is a government scheme that provides ₹6,000 per year to eligible farmers.

issues.question: how to report garbage issue
issues.answer: You can report garbage issues through your municipal website or this app's chat.

issues.question: how to apply for aadhar
issues.answer: Visit your nearest Aadhaar Seva Kendra or apply online at uidai.gov.in.

issues.question: who is the cm of andhra pradesh
issues.answer: As of 2024, the Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh is N. Chandrababu Naidu.

issues.question: how to check pension status
issues.answer: You can check pension status on the respective government portal or by visiting the local office.

issues.question: what is digital india
issues.answer: Digital India is a campaign launched to ensure government services are made available to citizens electronically.

issues.question: how to get voter id
issues.answer: You can apply for a voter ID online at nvsp.in or visit the local election office.

issues.question: how to register a civic complaint
issues.answer: Use this chatbot to report issues or visit your local municipal corporation site.

issues.question: what is swachh bharat
issues.answer: Swachh Bharat is a nationwide cleanliness campaign launched by the Indian government.

issues.question: how to apply for ration card
issues.answer: You can apply for a ration card online via your state’s food and civil supplies website.

issues.question: who is the president of india
issues.answer: As of 2024, the President of India is Droupadi Murmu.

issues.question: what is ujwala scheme
issues.answer: PM Ujjwala Yojana provides LPG connections to women from BPL households.

issues.question: what is digilocker
issues.answer: DigiLocker is a digital platform for issuing and verifying documents & certificates online.

issues.question: how to contact municipality
issues.answer: You can find municipality contact details on your city’s official website.

issues.question: how to apply for driving license
issues.answer: You can apply for a driving license through parivahan.gov.in or your local RTO.

issues.question: what is ayushman bharat scheme
issues.answer: Ayushman Bharat provides free health coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year.

issues.question: how to link aadhar with mobile
issues.answer: Visit your telecom provider's store or use their online service to link Aadhaar with mobile.

issues.question: how to file an RTI
issues.answer: You can file an RTI online at rtionline.gov.in or submit a handwritten application to the concerned department.

issues.question: how to register property online
issues.answer: You can register property online through your state government's Registration Department portal.
